mapper.select: select id from zj_paper_user where paper_id=#{paperId} and user_id =#{userId} and status=0

where.if: (a.fraction like concat('%',#{keyWords},'%') or b.paper_name like concat('%',#{keyWords},'%') or c.user_name like concat('%',#{keyWords},'%') or d.class_name like concat('%',#{keyWords},'%') or b.paper_score like concat('%',#{keyWords},'%') )

mapper.select: SELECT a.paper_id paperId,d.class_id classId, a.user_id ,a.fraction ,b.paper_name paperName, b.difficulty ,c.user_name userName,c.class_id,d.class_name className ,b.paper_score paperScore FROM zj_paper_user a LEFT JOIN zj_paper_info b ON a.paper_id = b.paper_id LEFT JOIN zj_user_info c ON a.user_id = c.user_id LEFT JOIN zj_class_info d ON c.class_id = d.class_id WHERE c.user_name IS NOT NULL AND d.class_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY a.create_time DESC

SELECT c.paper_name paperName,b.title_name titleName, b.title_answer titleAnswer, b.title_fraction titleFraction, b.choice1 ,b.choice2,b.choice3 ,b.choice4 FROM zj_subject_user_link a LEFT JOIN zj_title_info b ON a.title_id = b.title_id LEFT JOIN zj_paper_info c ON a.paper_id = c.paper_id WHERE a.paper_id = #{paperId}

SELECT a.fraction ,b.paper_name paperName, b.difficulty ,c.user_name userName,d.class_name className ,b.paper_score paperScore FROM zj_paper_user a LEFT JOIN zj_paper_info b ON a.paper_id = b.paper_id LEFT JOIN zj_user_info c ON a.user_id = c.user_id LEFT JOIN zj_class_info d ON c.class_id = d.class_id

SELECT a.fraction ,b.paper_name paperName,c.user_name userName,b.paper_score paperScore,a.id,b.paper_id paperId FROM zj_paper_user a LEFT JOIN zj_paper_info b ON a.paper_id = b.paper_id LEFT JOIN zj_user_info c ON a.user_id = c.user_id WHERE a.status =1 and a.user_id=#{userId}
select id from zj_paper_user where paper_id =#{paperId}
